item.title: sips: MacOS built-in image processing tool
item.author: contact@kayak4665664.com (kayak4665664)
item.description: I accidentally discovered the built-in sips command line tool in macOS, which is used to process and manipulate images. It supports multiple image formats and provides some common image processing functions such as compression, resizing, rotation, etc.

item.title: Spotlight Not Working Properly With Touch ID Unlock on MacOS
item.author: contact@kayak4665664.com (kayak4665664)
item.description: A few days ago, I suddenly found that Spotlight could not search anything, and the settings application could not search for settings items either. It seems that this phenomenon has occurred before, and this time I finally noticed it.

item.title: Simulate Locations for iOS17
item.author: contact@kayak4665664.com (kayak4665664)
item.description: I need to simulate location on iPhone recently. After some research, I finally found a simple and effective method.

item.title: battery: Battery Charge Limiter for Apple Silicon Macbook Devices
item.author: contact@kayak4665664.com (kayak4665664)
item.description: Today I found a command line tool that can limit the battery charging of Apple Silicon Macbook, called battery.

item.title: Capture Packets for Mobile Apps
item.author: contact@kayak4665664.com (kayak4665664)
item.description: Packet capture for mobile apps using Charles, Wireshark and tcpdump.

item.title: Authorize sudo Commands With Touch ID
item.author: contact@kayak4665664.com (kayak4665664)
item.description: Authorize sudo commands with Touch Id, so you don’t have to enter your password every time.

item.title: Randomize MAC Address for macOS
item.author: contact@kayak4665664.com (kayak4665664)
item.description: On iOS and iPadOS, you can enable private WiFi address to randomize MAC address in settings. There is no such option on macOS, but we can do it through the command line.

item.title: Strengthen macOS Terminal
item.author: contact@kayak4665664.com (kayak4665664)
item.description: The terminal of macOS is very good, but it feels like it’s missing something, so I strengthened it. There are many people who recommend using Oh My Zsh, but I don’t know why, I often have some problems when I use Oh My Zsh, so this time I didn’t use it.

item.title: KeyboardHolder: Automatically Switch Input Methods
item.author: contact@kayak4665664.com (kayak4665664)
item.description: Since I need to use both Chinese and English input methods at the same time, I often switch between Chinese and English. Sometimes I open Terminal and input Chinese. So I found a tool called KeyboardHolder, which can help us automatically switch input methods.

item.title: What Is Kerberos in Mac?
item.author: contact@kayak4665664.com (kayak4665664)
item.description: I suddenly found this Kerberos in the notification settings, what is it?

item.title: Modify the Icons Size in MacOS Launchpad
item.author: contact@kayak4665664.com (kayak4665664)
item.description: Icons can be resized by adjusting the number of icons per row and column of Launchpad.

item.title: Multiple Versions of Edge Browser Appear on Mac
item.author: contact@kayak4665664.com (kayak4665664)
item.description: Suddenly, I found that there are two Edge Dev on my Mac, 111.0.1660.13 and 111.0.1660.12, and both of them can launch normally. I want to keep the latest version and uninstall the old one.

item.title: texliveonfly, env: python: No Such File or Directory
item.author: contact@kayak4665664.com (kayak4665664)
item.description: Yesterday I used the texliveonfly package and got env: python: No Such File or Directory directly.

item.title: zsh: Tab Completion With Case Insensitivity
item.author: contact@kayak4665664.com (kayak4665664)
item.description: If you are using macOS, you can switch to the Documents directory by executing cd documents in ~, but you cannot use Tab to complete it.

item.title: AlDente: Limit MacBook Maximum Charging Percentage
item.author: contact@kayak4665664.com (kayak4665664)
item.description: Since the laptop uses a lithium battery, a long-term connection to the power adapter will cause the battery to always be at a high percentage, which will shorten the life of the battery. Therefore, keeping the percentage between 20% and 80% can delay the decay of the battery.

item.title: iconsur: Generate Rounded Rectangle Icons for MacOS Third-Party Software
item.author: contact@kayak4665664.com (kayak4665664)
item.description: There are always some software icons that are not compatible with macOS. iconsur can generate rounded rectangle icons for them to beautify our macOS.
